abstract: Fanticipation, from Fandango, the online seller of movie tickets, will rank upcoming releases based on a formula that includes social media data and advance ticket sales
snippet: Fanticipation, from Fandango, the online seller of movie tickets, will rank upcoming releases based on a formula that includes social media data and advance ticket sales
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES – Movie buzz is a heavily tilled field. Metacritic and Rotten Tomatoes track film reviews. The Internet Movie Database operates a heat index. Boxoffice.com offers charts based on Twitter and Facebook chatter.

headline.main: Fandango Creates a Movie Buzz Index
